member.name: T:OgcApi.Net.Options.CollectionOptions
member.summary: Information about the collection: id, title, features and tiles options, etc.
member.remarks: Can be extended with inheritor classes

member.name: P:OgcApi.Net.Options.CollectionOptions.Description
member.summary: Description for the understanding of the collection.

member.name: P:OgcApi.Net.Options.CollectionOptions.Extent
member.summary: Extent of all spatial objects in the collection.

member.name: P:OgcApi.Net.Options.CollectionOptions.ItemType
member.summary: An optional indicator about the type of the items in the collection (the default value, if the indicator is not provided, is 'feature')

member.name: P:OgcApi.Net.Options.CollectionOptions.CalculateNumberMatched
member.summary: An optional indicator that specifies whether the number of items in the collection should be calculated (true) or not (false).

member.name: T:OgcApi.Net.Options.Tiles.TileAccessDelegate
member.summary: Returns true when access to tile is granted according to the given parameters, otherwise returns false

member.name: T:OgcApi.Net.Options.Tiles.FeatureAccessDelegate
member.summary: Returns true when access to feature is granted according to the given parameters, otherwise returns false

member.name: T:OgcApi.Net.Resources.Collections
member.summary: Provides information about and access to the collections

member.name: T:OgcApi.Net.Resources.Conformance
member.summary: The conformance classes from standards or community specifications

member.name: T:OgcApi.Net.Resources.LandingPage
member.summary:
The Landing page provides links to:
the API definition
the Conformance declaration (path /conformance)
the Collections (path /collections)
